products.name: Collection Automation for Treasury
products.description: CAT is a user-friendly web app automating Treasury collection management. Streamline complex tasks, including client collections, billing, and user accounts, ensuring efficiency and security.

products.name: FC Bucketlist
products.description: The FC Bucketlist is a specialized online web application tailored for Marketing Representatives. It's primary purpose is to efficiently log client visits and track loan availing decisions

products.name: PAR Reason
products.description: The Collection Tool is a specialized web application tailored for efficient oversight and management of collection processes of PAR accounts. It can also generate PAR Reason Reports helpful in PAR Provisioning.

products.name: Pouch Receiving System
products.description: The Pouch Receiving System is a comprehensive web application enabling centralized management of item deliveries across nationwide branches and the Head Office, ensuring efficient operations.

products.name: PCNI CMS
products.description: The CMS (Contact Management System) is a specialized online web application tailored for caravan/sales personnel. It's primary purpose is to efficiently log client visits and track loan availing decisions.

products.name: ATM Inventory System
products.description: The ATM Inventory System is a dedicated web application designed for the efficient management and monitoring of ATM transmittals, ensuring streamlined operations and oversight.

products.name: Coda.io
products.description: Coda.io revolutionizes project management with its versatile, collaborative platform. It enables teams to streamline tasks and enhance productivity efficiently.

products.name: Hostwiki
products.description: Hostwiki powered by Wiki.js simplifies documentation processes. It's a versatile, collaborative platform for creating and managing comprehensive, user-friendly documentation.

products.name: SUKI Nextbank
products.description: Nextbank offers innovative banking solutions, enhancing financial services with user-friendly interfaces and cutting-edge technology for seamless and secure transactions.

products.name: FC Instafin
products.description: Instafin provides a comprehensive, user-friendly solution for financial services. It streamlines operations, enabling efficient management and delivery of financial products.

products.name: ECOUNT ERP
products.description: Ecount is a cloud-based software simplifying business operations. With integrated modules for inventory, accounting, HR, and more, it empowers users to efficiently manage diverse business functions.

products.name: Synology
products.description: DSM by Synology offers a robust, user-friendly platform for streamlined NAS management. Empowering users with efficient, secure, and versatile storage solutions.
